DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this prospective dose finding study is to estimate the minimal effective volume (ED95) for lidocaine 1.0% for filling the adductor canal when placing an adductor canal block. We will apply the Continual Reassessment Method (CRM) for estimating the ED95 and use an MRI scan to evaluate the main objective and ensure spread to the distal part of the adductor canal.
DOC.brief_title: ED95 of Lidocaine 1.0% for Filling the Adductor Canal
DOC.criteria: 1830 years Men American Society of Anesthesiologists' class 1 Body Mass Index 1825 Allergy to study medication Earlier trauma or surgery to the lower limb Diabetes Mellitus Contraindications to MRI
